New Records: If they manage to avoid defeat today in their first European Championship preparation match, they will be aiming to break an old record of remaining unbeaten for 13 games.
Pre-Game Insights: The Hungarian national soccer team will face Turkey in their first 2024 preparation match on Friday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played in front of a full house.
Others: If they maintain their winning streak, they will extend it to 13 games, surpassing the record set in the early 2000s. The last team to achieve a comparable streak was the “Golden Team” who won 15 of 18 games and drew three after losing the 1954 World Cup final. Their streak was halted in February 1956, when they were defeated, ominously, by the Turkish team scoring 3-1 in Istanbul.
